chunk_text:
### The Governor's Gazebo
Across the lawn from the Pavilion sits the perfect gazebo for intimate high tea style showers or luncheons for up to 14 people. It can be added to the Pavilion rental across the way to expand your space. ### The Little Gazebo
Nestled in the trees above our tasting room sits a gazebo perfect for a small gathering or private tasting for you and up to 10 people.
